question: The Ministry of Home Affairs has made amendments to set up Industrial Development Corporation in which state/UT?
explanation:
As per the new notification released by the Union Ministry of Home Affairs, the Jammu and Kashmir Development Act, 1970 has been amended.
By the amendment, a new chapter in the law has been inserted to set up the Jammu and Kashmir Industrial Development Corporation. It aims to establish industries in industrial areas and industrial estates in the union territory.
